thread.section_title: Emeraude Hotel Plaza Etoile - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hotel and accomodation
thread.title_full: Great hotel and accomodation - Review of Emeraude Hotel Plaza Etoile, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Elias K
title: Great hotel and accomodation
text: Located near a central metro station, with very friendly and helpful staff and very clean room with daily service !!! The room was rather small but this is something common in most facilities in Paris. Elevator was also available. Price is considered reasonable if you book early, You can find almost everything in the building block around. Breakfast is also available in the hotel, however we didn't taste it, so we cannot comment about it. Toilet facilites, heating, toileteries and everything in the room was very good
